body: My client looks like this atm, it started with me getting screen frozen in game and so i  repaired lol, did what the support lol site said, updated drivers, DirectX etc. and now i loged in played a custom to see if it was fixed and this happened. please help thank you

replies.body:
Wow that looks amazing...Is this just with the client?  Do you have another monitor with a different orientation?  What happens if you open anything else or even the legacy client?

-  On the login screen of the open beta updated client, look for the "Launch Legacy Client" text at the bottom.
-  Or create a shortcut directly to the legacy client in your League Installation. Just look for "lol.launcher" 

What's the resolution you're currently playing at?  Keep in mind that it can't exceed 1920x1080.  Let me know!
It looks like the norton security might be the problem, i removed it just for the sake of trying everything and now it all Works good and well
